songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ayy, this my suicide note, suicide doors
Noose around my neck
Ayy, this my suicide note, suicide doors, hey
(Okay, I'll take it seriously)
This my suicide note, suicide doors
Told her feel my pain like I’m Cris D

[Chorus]
Ayy, this my suicide note, suicide doors
Gold noose around my neck, bitch, I had to let it go
Ayy, this my suicide note, suicide doors
Gold noose around my neck, bitch, I had to let it go
This my suicide note, suicide doors
Gold noose around my neck, yeah, I had to let it go
Yeah, this my suicide note, suicide doors
Gold noose around my neck, bitch, I had to let it go

[Post-Chorus]
Ohh (Bitch, I had to let it go)
Take my life 'cause I don't want it no more
(I don’t want my life no more)
(I don't want it, I don't want my life)
I don't want it no more

[Verse]
Well, deep in my soul I be that Black Plague, demon shade grey
Poppin' on too many pills up in my Range
Can't phase me
I'm too shady, maybe I'm simply crazy
Baby I’m too dangerous
Hold up, man, like this shit get poppin’ like pimples
This shit get deeper then dimples
Opp, you ain't think that I would miss you?
I was brought up from the gutta, raised, slayed a mothafucka
Diamonds white bright, lookin’ like the eyes of Raiden
Remember kickin' inside them doors in that house, I had to raid in
Best believe I jumped off over that porch when I was 13
What they sayin'?
Chain looking like a spirit bombl I gotta spray shit
Yeah spray shit
That Teflon, Uzi at his chest he meet his maker
Yuske Urameshi with that spirit gun
Nigga said that he want smoke, I ain't hearing none
He said he want pressure, well, come get you some
He said he want pressure, bitch, come get you some

[Interlude]
I can’t really fake the funk
All these niggas, they ain't get it out the mud
Bitch, I got it out the jump
Bitch, I was jumpin' like a Jumpman
23, run

[Chorus]
Ayy, this my suicide note, suicide doors
Gold noose around my neck, bitch, I had to let it go
Ayy, this my suicide note, suicide doors
Gold noose around my neck, bitch, I had to let it go
This my suicide note, suicide doors
Gold noose around my neck, yeah, I had to let it go
Yeah, this my suicide note, suicide doors
Gold noose around my neck, bitch, I had to let it go

[Post-Chorus]
Ohh (Bitch, I had to let it go)
Take my life 'cause I don't want it no more
(I don't want my life no more)
(I don't want it, I don't want my life)
I don't want it no more
songs.album: Leave Me the Fuck Alone - EP
songs.title: Suicide Note
